items.preText: Salin: "Good to see Soumya and Tamim giving a good start yet again. Tough luck for Liton Das to find a place in this team. Bangladesh is looking a settled squad for the CWC19."
items.text: ooh, nearly. Goes hard at the cut and toe-ends it, sends it flying past the left hand of the diving slip fielder
items.shortText: Nurse to Tamim Iqbal, FOUR runs

items.text: down the track now as Nurse gives this some air, gets into the perfect position to drill this drive past the bowler's right foot
items.shortText: Nurse to Tamim Iqbal, FOUR runs

items.text: length ball outside off, stretches out to defend
items.shortText: Nurse to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: bowled him! Nurse delivers the breakthrough. Tamim jumps down the track again, but this time he isn't quite to the pitch of the ball. It dips on him, and zips through with the angle. Tamim plays for turn, looking to block it hurriedly, and it sneaks through the gate and hits leg stump
items.shortText: Nurse to Tamim Iqbal, OUT

items.preText: Shakib Al Hasan walks in at No. 3.
items.text: flat length ball angling in towards middle stump, clipped to midwicket
items.shortText: Nurse to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: nicely flighted outside off, defended towards backward point
items.shortText: Nurse to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: short, gets it up to about shoulder height outside off. Pulled away nicely to deep square leg, rolls his wrists over to keep it down
items.shortText: Cottrell to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

items.text: back of a length on off stump, looks to get on top of the bounce and work it square on the leg side, ends up hitting it down into his pads
items.shortText: Cottrell to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: shortish, angling into Shakib's midriff, tucked awkwardly into the square leg region
items.shortText: Cottrell to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: length ball angling into off stump, clipped to midwicket
items.shortText: Cottrell to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: back of a length on off stump, pulled off the front foot to the left of deep square leg
items.shortText: Cottrell to Soumya Sarkar, 2 runs

items.text: slower length ball close to off stump, presses forward, waits, and defends into the point region
items.shortText: Cottrell to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.preText: That's the end of the first Powerplay. Four fielders can go out onto the boundary now. A slip still in place for Nurse.
items.text: back of a length on off stump, waits on it and plays a soft-hands push into the point region
items.shortText: Nurse to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: back of a length close to off stump, punched to deep cover
items.shortText: Nurse to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

items.text: length ball sliding onto the pads, clipped to deep square leg
items.shortText: Nurse to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: length ball on off stump, driven down to long-off
items.shortText: Nurse to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

items.text: tossed up slower and wider, stretches out to drive through point
items.shortText: Nurse to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: full on off stump, driven to short extra-cover
items.shortText: Nurse to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.preText: Offspin from both ends. Here's Roston Chase, from round the wicket. Slip in place for him too.
items.text: back of a length close to off stump. Makes a bit of room to cut and Carter dives to his left to stop it at backward point
items.shortText: Chase to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: slower length ball close to off stump, stretches out to defend
items.shortText: Chase to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: short, wide, stops on Shakib, slapped to the man at cover
items.shortText: Chase to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: dangled up wide of off stump, driven to sweeper cover
items.shortText: Chase to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: full on middle and off, driven inside-out into the cover point region
items.shortText: Chase to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

items.text: lots of flight again, wide of off, Shakib plays a flat-bat drive through cover point
items.shortText: Chase to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.preText: Jerk Chicken : "The WI selectors have to show confidence in their abilities to pick a squad so don't expect more than 2 changes., The spin bowling is a weakness, Chase and Campbell could offer a few overs while stabilising the top top and middle order. Bravo and Lewis are leading suspect."
items.text: full on off stump, driven to long-on
items.shortText: Nurse to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run
